Summary: A dull orange and yellow light.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Tell City
There were no other sightings in Tell City on or around July 2nd 2010
divs: sighting detailssome friends and i were in their front lawn and i happened to look up and see an object comeing twards us.i wasnt alarmed at first because i thought it might be a plane or jet but as it began to get closer i than realized it was moveing too fast for an aircraft of any i have seen before. i am retired from the military service and this is nothing like i have seen before.as it passed directly overhead there was a pulsating orange glow comming from underneath.if this was a plane,jet or a commet it would of left a trail.this made no sound at all.there were other witnesses to comfirm what i or we saw. this object really stunned us because like i said,i can identify many aircraft,this is something new. i am a paranormal investigator\researcher and this was not normal.i had no camera or anything to verfy what we saw but our own testimony.
